about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Background:
Players take on the role of a little monster transported to a world under the control of a dark lord. In this savage world filled with dangerous and bizarre creatures, you must rebuild tribal strongholds, embark on unique adventures, challenge various monsters, collect treasures, unlock your genetic forms, gain new skills and talents, and defeat powerful tribal enemies. Survival, growth, adventure, and exploration are key to unraveling this world's mysteries and finding the path to defeat the monsters.

Features:
The game features a rich combination of construction, skills, items, and summons, offering various strategic setups and stylish combat. Unlock genes to transform your form and talents, enriching your character's appearance and style. The challenge mode invites players to face off against uniquely styled Cthulhu bosses, creating their own strategic builds to achieve legendary status.

Gameplay:
The core gameplay revolves around continuously challenging and exploring the alien world, using combat skills to defeat monsters of various forms. Evolve new genes and bloodline powers, master new combat techniques and talents, and unlock new forms. Combine shop items and skills to form powerful combat strategies and stylishly cut through enemies. Challenge distinct Cthulhu leaders in various terrains like plains, deserts, forests, and ports.

  • Processor: AMD FX-4350 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 560 (4GB VRAM) / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 (4GB VRAM)

short_description: "Happy Monster" is a roguelike game themed around dragons and Cthulhu monsters. Players control a small monster, fighting through an alien world filled with monsters. Survive, grow stronger, and explore to unlock new forms, gain power, and uncover ways to defeat the monsters.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
